summary: Completed frontend implementation for FedEx Carrier Integration & Multi-Carrier Network. Implemented comprehensive UI components for carrier management, rate shopping, shipment creation with multi-carrier support, and real-time tracking synchronization.

key_changes: Added GraphQL mutations: DELETE_CARRIER_INTEGRATION, VOID_SHIPMENT, CREATE_MANIFEST, REFRESH_TRACKING
Added GraphQL queries: GET_CARRIER_INTEGRATION, TEST_CARRIER_CONNECTION, GET_RATE_QUOTES, VALIDATE_ADDRESS, TRACK_SHIPMENT
Created FedExSetupWizard component with 4-step guided configuration (Basic Info → API Credentials → Preferences → Review & Test)
Created CreateShipmentModal component with 3-step process including real-time rate shopping from all configured carriers
Enhanced ShipmentDetailPage with void shipment capability for MANIFESTED status and refresh tracking for shipments with tracking numbers
Added comprehensive translations covering 100+ keys for carrier integration, FedEx setup, shipment creation, rate shopping, status labels, and error messages

notes: Frontend implementation follows patterns from existing invoice and payment features
All components integrate with production-ready backend implemented by Roy (REQ-1767925582663-ieqg0)
CarrierIntegrationsPage.tsx already existed in good state, no modifications needed
FedEx Setup Wizard supports both create and update modes with built-in connection testing
Rate shopping component displays quotes from all carriers with cost comparison and transit time
Address validation and label generation integrated into shipment workflow
Multi-package support with add/remove functionality in shipment creation
Shipment lifecycle properly handled: DRAFT → MANIFESTED → SHIPPED → DELIVERED with appropriate actions per status
